sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
FilterRows sink(input(
		year as integer,
		ratingByYear as double,
		yearkey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['yearkey']) ~> sink1

transformations.name: CreateAggs
transformations.script:
StageSource aggregate(groupBy(year = year),
	ratingByYear = round(avg((Rating * 5) + {Rotton Tomato}),2)) ~> CreateAggs
